question: S. Abdul Rahman, who passed away recently, was the famous poet of which language?
explanation: Tamil poet S. Abdul Rahman (79), popularly known as \'Kavikko,\' has passed away in Chennai, Tamil Nadu on June 2, 2017. He belonged to the Vanambadi literary movement and was one of the most admired poets of modern Tamil literature. His poetry collection \'Aalapanai\' won the prestigious Sahitya Akademi award in the year 1999. Apart from that he has won a lot of awards. His noted works includes Aalapanai, Paal veedhi, Neyar viruppam, Pithan, etc.
